text: Nangni thosik danchu ingamna hi kadik eii tia minmusik, tichu minmangthei ka-eii soonna hi-um meiya inrouwa in-en inle nangni inngamna kha soonna neek ah kathadoom kha-um madan inta in-ensik eii, khawakha e-inchu nangni ngamna khan deimatorna neiningte. Halli Jisu Christa juoinlarni nangni'n minpaakna, lurlianna khat-um kayana kha muningte.
